participant_1.background:
I have a secret tattoo that my dad would hate.
i m single.
I have a baby monitor to keep an eye on my little one.
i like reading horror novels.
i have a golden retriever.

participant_2.background:
I love going to farmer's markets with my friends because we can explore new foods and find fresh produce.
i like crab dipped in butter.
I keep my clothes clean but my Renaissance Faire outfit is a special case.
I would love to have a pet dog but I can't because of my job.
when i m not touring with the band , i like to garden.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I love going to farmer's markets with my friends!
That sounds really fun! I haven't been to one in a long time.
Yeah, it's a great way to explore new foods and find fresh produce.
What's your favorite thing to get at the farmer's market?
Oh, that's a tough one! I love fresh fruits and vegetables, but I think I'd have to say crab dipped in butter.
Wow, that sounds delicious! I've never had crab before.
Oh my gosh, you have to try it! It's so good.
I'll have to keep that in mind! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read horror novels. I have a secret tattoo that my dad would hate, and I have a golden retriever.
Oh, I love horror novels too! I have a few tattoos, but I don't think my dad would hate them. I wish I could have a pet dog, but I'm a musician and I'm on tour a lot.
That's too bad! Dogs are the best.
Yeah, they are.
What kind of music do you play?
I'm in a band that plays folk music.
That sounds really cool! I love folk music.
Thanks! We're pretty good.
I'm sure you are!
Thanks
